RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 95. Starter Allowance Purse 19000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $7,500 OR LESS IN THE LAST 5 STARTS. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 18 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Co nsidered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GEHRIG dueled on the lead throughout, edged clear late, driving. AMIGO'S AFFAIR dueled with the winner, was outfinished late but held place. FRONTLINER had good position on the inside and went evenly late. LIMIT UP was bumped early, raced three wide and had no late gain CLAW raced four wide and was no threat. JOSHY JAK was bumped early, raced between horses and lacked a bid. NASHVEGAS never far back on the inside, lacked a late response.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BAREFOOT BEACH raced close up early, angled out three wide in the stretch, closed determinedly and was up in the final strides. APPEALING SENORITA settled early, rallied five wide down the backside, drew even at the quarter pole, gained a clear lead in mid stretch and was caught the last jumps. LADY ABRIL set the pace for three quarters and weakened slightly. ARTIES CRYPTONITE tracked four wide and was no menace. EASTER PRIDE raced between horses and had no rally. CROSSED UP was never far back early and lacked a late response. MY PINK BABY BIRD steadied in the first turn on the inside, saved ground, and had no late response. LATE DATE trailed.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 12800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 18. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KLAATU set the pace and dueled on the lead, was hooked at the quarter pole, dug in gamely in the stretch and prevailed . KING OF THE RING raced mid pack early, rallied on the inside in the stretch and just missed. MONEY FOR MISCHIEF raced in the second flight while racing wide, rallied on the far while four wide, finished willingly in a good effort. SEMINOLE JUSTICE had good position on the inside and weakened slightly. JUSTENUFFTUFF raced mid pack, angled out in the stretch and had a mild bid. ROSAS WAY raced mid pack and was no menace. ROCK ON KITTEN had good position on the inside and faltered. LEXATOGA allowed to settle, failed to menace. BUCKY broke slowly and was outrun. PROFESSIONAL was a sharp factor for three quarters, then gave way in the stretch.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 15400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NYOMAN settled early, rallied on the turn four wide, closed determinedly and wore down his rivals. DECEITFUL ANTHONY dueled on the lead throughout, was outfinished late but held place. TOO LEGIT had good position throughout, rallied while between horses and finished well. AMERICAN UNION had good position on the inside, was in tight in the stretch, finished well when clear. DIAMONDS ENJOY raced close up throughout and went evenly late. I'M A COOL MAN dueled on the lead from the inside and faltered late. ARTIE MY BOY allowed to settle, lacked a late kick. THE FILTER tracked five wide and faltered. AJWIBAH was outrun. The stewards posted the inquiry sign and the rider of IM A COOL MAN claimed foul against the rider of DECEITFUL ANTHONY for alleged interference at the quarter pole. After viewing the tape the stewrds took no action.

ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled on the lead from the inside and faltered late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 14300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MUSICAL RIDE pressed early, dueled from the quarter pole to the wire and prevailed. MOANA'S TALE raced mid pack early, rallied four wide, closed fast and just missed. MON PARADIS raced mid pack early, rallied in the stretch on the rail and finished well in a blanket finish. MYRRH set the pace and dueled on the lead, held grudgingly and just missed. TALK DIRTY had good position on the inside and went evenly late. BEING CREATIVE allowed to settle, swung wide in the stretch and was no threat. DREAM TO WIN had good position early and was through after a half. TICKLISH raced mid pack and was no menace. WICKED VALENTINE slow early, was outrun. RUN AWAY FEVER was outrun. The stewards posted the inquiry sign but took no action.

Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of $25,000 Since November 18 Allowed 3 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances). .
RACE.FOOTNOTES: POWER BANKER pressed early, rallied down the backside, dueled through the stretch, battled gamely and just prevailed. WINDY LU WHO set the pace and dueled on the lead, held with good courage in the stretch and just missed. R THREE ANGELS was well placed early on the inside, angled out three wide in the stretch and finished well. SHE'S CRAFTY was unhurried early, and trailed, swung wide in the stretch and closed a gap. BALLROOM BLITZ allowed to settle, failed to menace. AUNT BEE tracked four wide and tired in the stretch. WINE ME UP BABY raced wide early, contended until the top of the stretch, then gave way. AUJARA saved ground, and was outrun.

Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 18 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considere d In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KICHI KITSU was well placed early, rallied on the turn with a quick move, drew off late under right handed urging. FACTISIMFLASHY set the pace and dueled on the lead, finished willingly and was second best. WILLIAMSBEACHBABE raced mid pack early, had a mild bid late while no threat. BUCKEYE RED had brief foot and was through early. BLAZIANO was outrun.
